npc.speach: The druids, keepers of the relics, were so affected by the leaking hatred of the relics that their keeper, Wynston Griffith, committed a massacre that clamied half of the lives of the druids still reaming in Aldurnia.
A few isolated, lesser events later, the few that remained drew the connection between the relics and the recent tradgedies and worked to develop techniques to prevent hatred from consuming them.
Eventually, they decided that the best way to protect the relics was to split them up among themselves and disperse them throughout the land.
In this way, the leakage would not be as concentrated and they would not be tempted, or able, to kill one another..... or so they thought.
